sentence.text: We observed odds ratios (ORs) of 1.7-2.3 for lung cancer (LC; P=4.0 × 10(-4)), chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (ER to Golgi vesicle-mediated transport; P=9.3 × 10(-4)), peripheral artery disease (mRNA splicing, via spliceosome; P=0.090) and abdominal aortic aneurysms (nucleocytoplasmic transport; P=0.12), and the variant associates strongly with the early-onset forms of LC (OR=4.49, P=2.2 × 10(-4)), ER to Golgi vesicle-mediated transport (OR=3.22, P=2.9 × 10(-4)), mRNA splicing, via spliceosome (OR=3.47, P=9.2 × 10(-3)) and AAA (OR=6.44, P=6.3 × 10(-3)).
